index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Construction and Land Use; in connection with the West Point Sewer Treatment Plant, authorizing an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for reimbursement of permit processing costs, establishing a position in the Department and authorizing other staffing costs, authorizing consulting contracts, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1989 Budget of the Department and directing carry-over of the appropriation, and making reimbursable appropriation from the Construction and Land Use Operating Fund therefor.
